title: Installation issue: ROOT build failure
body:
It seems the ROOT package build fails from a fresh Spack environment.  Not sure if it's related to #8428 or if the problem has been there longer than that.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ git clone https://github.com/spack/spack.git
$ cd spack
$ . share/spack/setup-env.sh
$ spack install root
...
( a bunch of dependency installations that install without error )
...
==> Installing root
==> Searching for binary cache of root
==> Warning: No Spack mirrors are currently configured
==> No binary for root found: installing from source
==> Fetching https://root.cern/download/root_v6.16.00.source.tar.gz
####################################################################################################################### 100.0%
==> Staging archive: /tmp/support/spack/var/spack/stage/root-6.16.00-qpabtrilh3ugsrefofspbgwuagkdvo5c/root_v6.16.00.source.tar.gz
==> Created stage in /tmp/support/spack/var/spack/stage/root-6.16.00-qpabtrilh3ugsrefofspbgwuagkdvo5c
==> No patches needed for root
==> Building root [CMakePackage]
==> Executing phase: 'cmake'
==> Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j24'

31 errors found in build log:
     17838    cd /tmp/support/spack-stage/spack-stage-tZTGTo/root-6.16.00/spack-build/math/fumili && /tmp/support/spack/opt/s

              k_library ../../lib/libFumili.so.6.16.00 ../../lib/libFumili.so.6.16 ../../lib/libFumili.so

              pack/env/gcc/g++   -I/tmp/support/spack-stage/spack-stage-tZTGTo/root-6.16.00/spack-build/include  -Wno-implici
              t-fallthrough -Wno-noexcept-type -pipe -m64  -Wshadow -Wall -W -Woverloaded-virtual -fsigned-char -pthread -std
              =c++11 -O3 -g -DNDEBUG -fPIC   -o CMakeFiles/Gpad.dir/src/TViewer3DPad.cxx.o -c /tmp/support/spack/var/spack/st
```
